content: Just to let the combinatorialists among you know that I'm doing the basics of intersecting families. I'm going through Families of Non-disjoint subsets and have already formalised Harris-Kleitman.
Once more, Bhavik is to blame for nerdsniping me :grinning:
Just to add that I proved Erdos-Ko-Rado over two years ago, but Yaël should hopefully be proving some generalisations of it now!

• #14475 for the basics
  • #14497 for Harris-Kleitman
  • #14543 for Kleitman's bound
